panels.description:
Details of the AWS response to the "put batch" request.
There are usually 500 requests in a batch.
Each request that succeeds will increment the "Success" counter.
If AWS throws an Exception in response to the batch, then all of the requests will be retried, and the "Exception" counter will be incremented by 1.
Throttling is on a request basis, so every throttled request will increment the "Throttled" counter and will be retried until succeeding.
All other failures are also per request; they increment the "Failures" counter with each failed request and are retried until succeeding.

targets.query: SELECT sum("SUCCESS_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-firehose-writer" WHERE "class" = 'com_expedia_www_haystack_pipes_firehoseWriter_FirehoseProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("FAILURE_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-firehose-writer" WHERE "class" = 'com_expedia_www_haystack_pipes_firehoseWriter_FirehoseProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("THROTTLED_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-firehose-writer" WHERE "class" = 'com_expedia_www_haystack_pipes_firehoseWriter_Batch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("EXCEPTION_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-firehose-writer"  WHERE "class" = 'com_expedia_www_haystack_pipes_firehoseWriter_FirehoseProcessor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("SOCKET_TIMEOUT_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-firehose-writer"  WHERE "class" = 'com_expedia_www_haystack_pipes_firehoseWriter_S3Sender' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Success / Failure / Throttled / Exception Per 5 Minutes

targets.query: SELECT sum("45.ERROR_COUNTER") FROM "haystack.errors.pipes-firehose-writer" WHERE "fqClass" != 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-firehoseWriter-FailedRecordExtractor' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-commons-SystemExitUncaughtExceptionHandler' AND "lineNumber" = '54' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'org-apache-kafka-common-utils-KafkaThread$1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'org-apache-juli-logging-DirectJDKLog' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'org-apache-juli-logging-DirectJDKLog' AND "lineNumber" = '181' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'org-apache-juli-logging-DirectJDKLog' AND "lineNumber" = '181' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-firehoseWriter-FirehoseProcessor' AND "lineNumber" = '108' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-firehoseWriter-FailedRecordExtractor' AND "lineNumber" = '101' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-firehoseWriter-FailedRecordExtractor' AND "lineNumber" = '101' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace_name" = 'haystack-apps' AND "container_name" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name"
SELECT "value" FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace_name" = 'haystack-apps' AND "container_name" = 'pipes-firehose-writer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "records-lag.max" FROM "haystack.pipes.secret-detector" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("heapMemoryUsage.used") FROM "haystack.pipes.secret-detector" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("SPAN_ARRIVAL_MS_GAUGE_max") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-secret-detector" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
